columns.name: DRIVER_GID
columns.description: The driver GID.

columns.name: DRIVER_XID
columns.description: The XID for the driver.

columns.name: DEF_HOME_LOC_GID
columns.description: Driver's Home Location ID.

columns.name: FIRST_NAME
columns.description: The driver's first name.

columns.name: LAST_NAME
columns.description: The driver's last name.

columns.name: DATE_OF_BIRTH
columns.description: The driver's date of birth.

columns.name: WORK_REGION_GID
columns.description: The driver's primary work region.

columns.name: DED_ACCT_LOCN_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The location profile of the driver's dedicated account.

columns.name: CONTACT_GID
columns.description: The contact user linked to the driver.

columns.name: RATE_OFFERING_GID
columns.description: The rate offering linked to the driver.

columns.name: PREF_CONSTRAINT_CONFIG_GID
columns.description: Holds all the Preferences and Constraints for this Driver as a Logic Configuration group.

columns.name: RESOURCE_TYPE
columns.description: This enumerate indicates the employment type of the driver. Values include - E - Employed I - Independent Contractor T - Third Party.

columns.name: USE_HOS_HISTORY
columns.description: This flag indicates if each shipment for this driver should start with fresh HOS regardless of previous history/shipments.

columns.name: ADJ_HIRE_DATE
columns.description: Adjusted hire date.

columns.name: CORPORATION_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The corporations for which this driver works.

columns.name: DRIVER_TYPE_GID
columns.description: This driver's driver type.

columns.name: IS_ACTIVE
columns.description: Indicate if the driver is active.

columns.name: SIGHTING_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Location of sighting.

columns.name: SIGHTING_DATE
columns.description: Date of sighting.

columns.name: PREV_SIGHTING_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Previous location of sighting.

columns.name: PREV_SIGHTING_DATE
columns.description: Previous date of sighting.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED1_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: DRIVER_ASSIGNMENT_SEQ_NUM
columns.description: Reflects the latest Driver Assignment record for the driver.

columns.name: RATE_DISTANCE_GID
columns.description: The rate distance at the driver level.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The End Date is the last day/date the driver is available. The shipments' start date and end dates must both fall within the drivers' effective and end date range for an assignment to be feasible, in which case, the driver is assigned to the shipment. If the driver assignment itself pushes the end date of the shipment past the drivers' expiration date, it will be allowed.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
